tool_description: Calculates shipping insurance costs and coverage options based on item values and carrier policies.

declared_value.description: Total declared value of items in USD

error_messages: Invalid declared value: Value must be positive and greater than $0
Unsupported carrier: Insurance options not available for selected carrier
Value too high for coverage: Declared value exceeds maximum insurable amount
Invalid coverage type: Use one of [standard, enhanced, full_replacement]
usage: Provide declared_value, carrier_code, and optionally coverage_type to calculate insurance costs and options.
